languages.text:
Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain momentum equal to their resolve.

Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

languages.text:
每当装备者使用与前一次攻击类型不同的攻击时，都会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
攻击类型包括{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击（包括单次攻击与连续攻击）、范围近战攻击、范围射击、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用与前一次攻击类型不同的攻击时，都会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text:
Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, равный своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Атаки бывают следующих типов: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака вблизи{/g} (одиночная или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}), атака рукопашным оружием по области, выстрел по области и выстрел очередью.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает моментум, равный своей решимости.
Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает моментум, равный своей решимости.

languages.text:
使用者が直前の攻撃と異なるタイプの攻撃を使用するたびに、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を獲得する。
攻撃タイプには{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}(単体または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g})、範囲近接攻撃、範囲遠距離攻撃、遠距離バースト攻撃がある。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が直前の攻撃と異なるタイプの攻撃を使用するたびに、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text:
Si el portador usa un ataque de un tipo diferente al anterior, obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
Los tipos de ataque son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}disparo único{/g}, ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} (único o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}), cuerpo a cuerpo de área, a distancia de área o de ráfaga de área.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador usa un ataque de un tipo diferente al anterior, obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

languages.text:
Setzte der Träger einen Angriff ein, dessen Typ sich von seinem vorherigen Angriff unterscheidet, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} in Höhe seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Gültige Angriffstypen sind: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}angriff (Einzelziel oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g}), Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-Fernkampfangriff oder Salven-Fernkampfangriff.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.

traits.locale_text:
Setzte der Träger einen Angriff ein, dessen Typ sich von seinem vorherigen Angriff unterscheidet, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} in Höhe seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Gültige Angriffstypen sind: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}angriff (Einzelziel oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g}), Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-Fernkampfangriff oder Salven-Fernkampfangriff.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque d'un type différent de la précédente, il reçoit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
Les types d'attaques valides sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone à distance ou attaque en rafale à distance.
languages.original_text:
Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, равный своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Атаки бывают следующих типов: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака вблизи{/g} (одиночная или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}), атака рукопашным оружием по области, выстрел по области и выстрел очередью.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque d'un type différent de la précédente, il reçoit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, bir önceki saldırısından farklı bir türde saldırı yaptığı her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değeri kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
Geçerli saldırı türleri şunlardır: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Tek atış{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} saldırısı (tek hedefli veya {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g}), alan etkili yakın dövüş, alan etkili menzilli veya menzilli seri saldırı.
languages.original_text:
